channel.title: CVE Feed for Forcepoint -- Forcepoint Email Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Forcepoint -- Forcepoint Email Security

item.title: CVE-2019-6142|2024-08-04T20:16:24.524Z -- forcepoint -- forcepoint%20email%20security
item.description: It has been reported that XSS is possible in Forcepoint Email Security, versions 8.5 and 8.5.3. It is strongly recommended that you apply the relevant hotfix in order to remediate this issue.

item.title: CVE-2019-6140|2024-08-04T20:16:23.961Z -- forcepoint -- forcepoint%20email%20security
item.description: A configuration issue has been discovered in Forcepoint Email Security 8.4.x and 8.5.x: the product is left in a vulnerable state if the hybrid registration process is not completed.
